participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Samantha is outgoing and enthusiastic, always looking for creative ways to express herself.
participant_1.background: My wedding planning business took off after I had my home featured in a magazine for being the cleanest in the city. I am a member of the YMCA. My nickname is Bubblegum. I like to swim. My favorite subject in school is math.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Oliver is introspective and passionate, often channeling his creativity into his projects, though he sometimes struggles to balance work and personal pursuits.
participant_2.background: I believe that I have a good relationship with my family. I collect movie memorabilia from my favorite movies. I have freckles all over my face. During the week, I work as a barista. I often neglect my own creative work in favor of my job.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing?
Hello! Not bad, just working on my movie memorabilia collection.
Oh that's cool, what kind of movies do you like?
I love all kinds of movies, but my favorite are horror and sci-fi.
I love sci-fi too! What are your favorite sci-fi movies?
I love all of the Star Wars movies, and I also really like the Alien movies.
Those are both great movies! I'm also a big fan of the Terminator movies.
Oh yeah, those are great too! I love Arnold Schwarzenegger in those movies.
Me too! He's so cool. So, what do you do for a living?
I work as a barista during the week, but I'm also a writer.
Oh that's awesome! Do you write books or screenplays?
I write both, but I'm more focused on screenplays right now.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be very successful.
